# 2025 Dwars door Vlaanderen for Women

| second             = Lotte Kopecky

The 2025 Dwars door Vlaanderen for Women was a road cycling one-day race that took place on 2 April 2025 in Belgium. It was the 13th edition of the women's race of Dwars door Vlaanderen. The race was won by Italian Elisa Longo Borghini, who rode solo for the final  to take her 50th career victory.
Teams
Thirteen UCI Women's WorldTeams, five UCI Women's ProTeams, and six UCI Women's Continental Teams took part in the race.
